This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was 8 or 830 not entirely sure but i was on my way to the gas station when i saw a really bright star in the distance. it was moving west to south and was moving very irregularly. when i got closer the whitish looking star was actually bright green . I go out of my car at the gas station and two other guys saw it as well. we watch it sit their still in disbelief about 200 feet in the air. it then very quickly descended into the tree lines. as it descended in the trees the colors changed to blue and red and was very bright. i saw it quickly ascend back up and lost its place quick. video is sideways and im not sure how to change that.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
